item.title: California fires live updates: Biden to give remarks on fire response
item.description: At least five people are dead and many more injured as several fires broke out across Southern California amid historically dry and windy conditions.

item.title: Before, during and after the wildfires: A look at the devastation in California
item.description: Unprecedented wildfires in Los Angeles County in California are decimating thousands of structures and displacing thousands of residents.

item.title: Trump talks with Barack Obama, shakes hands with Mike Pence during Carter funeral
item.description: Donald Trump shook hands with Mike Pence at Jimmy Carter's state funeral -- a notable exchange as the two men have not interacted publicly in years.

item.title: LIVE: State funeral for former President Jimmy Carter underway in DC: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: Trump pays his respects to Jimmy Carter at the Capitol
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump paid his respects to former President Jimmy Carter on Wednesday at the Capitol Rotunda.
